name: Verify Power Activation Sequence
description: Validates that the hanging power button activates power to the terminals with proper animation and visual feedback.
testObjective: Ensure power activation mechanic functions correctly and provides clear visual and audio feedback.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has entered the ship via ladder

steps.action: Locate the hanging button in front of the terminals
steps.expected: Hanging button is visible and appears interactable
Button begins raising animation with sound effect
Loading bar appears on the terminal and completes
Two terminals become interactable after power activation

postconditions: Player can interact with middle terminal
